name: grader
description: Template for cross-platform Node, JavaScript, HTML & CSS apps without the bloat. 'Massless' apps.

scripts.stats: npm run clean || : && rm -rf node_modules || : && getstats && cat stats/* || :
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary
scripts.bundle: cd src/ && echo $(pwd) && npx webpack && cd ../ && echo $(pwd) && npx webpack
scripts.pack-binary: npm run pack-binary-nix && npm run pack-binary-win && npm run pack-binary-mac && npm run pack-binary-32
scripts.build-nix: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary-nix
scripts.build-win: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary-win
scripts.build-mac: npm run bundle && npm run pack-binary-mac
scripts.pack-binary-32: npx nexe -t windows-x32 -o bin/grader.win32.exe -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*" && npx nexe -t linux-x32 -o bin/grader.nix32 -i build/grader.js -r "./build/*"
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ bin/ src/build/ || : && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p bin && mkdir -p src/build
scripts.test-app: npm run bundle && ./scripts/webzip.js && node -r esm src/app.js
scripts.tsc: tsc --types node --target ES2020 --checkJs --allowJs --outFile build/server-types.js  --module System src/app.js decs.d.ts

author: @dosy
